SEARCH
Package org.opengis.metadata.quality

Interface UsabilityElement

All Superinterfaces:
Element
All Known Subinterfaces:
Usability
@UML(identifier="DQ_UsabilityElement", specification=ISO_19157) public interface UsabilityElement extends Element
Degree of adherence of a data set to a specific set of requirements. Usability evaluation may be based on specific user requirements that cannot be described using the other quality elements.

Standardized values

In order to achieve well defined and comparable quality information, it is recommended to report data quality using quality measures listed in ISO 19157 annex. The following table provides a summary; see ISO 19157 for more complete descriptions and examples. All identifiers should be in "ISO 19157" namespace.
Standardized values derived from ISO 19157
Identifier Name of measure Basic measure Value type Remarks
101 data product specification passed correctness indicator Boolean true if all the requirements in the referred data product specification are fulfilled.
102 data product specification fail count error count Integer
103 data product specification pass count correct items count Integer
104 data product specification fail rate error rate Real
105 data product specification pass rate correct items rate Real

Definitions:

  1. Indication that all requirements in the referred data product specification are fulfilled.
  2. Number of data product specification requirements that are not fulfilled by the current product/data set.
  3. Number of data product specification requirements that are fulfilled by the current product/data set.
  4. Number of the data product specification requirements that are not fulfilled by the current product/data set in relation to the total number of data product specification requirements.
  5. Number of the data product specification requirements that are fulfilled by the current product/data set in relation to the total number of data product specification requirements.
Since:
3.1
